sentence: Greene is radioactive enough at this point that Herschel Walker pulled out of a joint appearance after Greene spoke at an event run by Holocaust-denying, Putin-cheering white nationalist Nick Fuentes an appearance denounced by both Mitch McConnell and Kevin McCarthy.
author: Dan McLaughlin
title: The Way to Beat Ilhan Omar or Marjorie Taylor Greene Is through Their Primary Opponents

sentence: President Joe Biden's administration sent letters to television personality Dr. Mehmet Oz and former NFL player Herschel Walker Wednesday, asking them to resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be terminated by the end of the day.
author: Lauren Frias
title: Biden asked Dr. Oz and Herschel Walker to resign from a presidential council or be terminated

sentence: In a reminder of the issue's divisiveness, Biden's call for gun control on Tuesday was booed at a campaign event in Georgia hosted by Herschel Walker, a Republican running for U.S. Senate.
author: Associated Press
title: Biden Says 'We Have to Act' After Texas School Shooting
